metadata.title: CVE-2016-5026 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: hs.py in OnionShare before 0.9.1 allows local users to modify thehiddenservice by pre-creating the /tmp/onionshare directory.

criterions.comment: onionshare: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
